title: Pointstore order payload
description: payload to create a new pointstore request

bbox.description: comma-separated list of geographic coordinates in units of decimal degrees. format: minx, miny, maxx, maxy

email.description: email address which will receive order notifications

resolution.description: generated grid cell size in meters

provider.description: trusted node name. only used for csb

platform.description: platform, aka ship or vessel name

collection_date.description: date on which the data were collected. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

archive_date.description: date on which the data were received at the DCDB. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

cruise.description: cruise on which the data were collected. Only used for multibeam
